name: @outfitter/grapple
description: A monorepo dedicated to tooling for Claude Code hooks
author: Matt Galligan <matt.galligan@gmail.com>

scripts.format: bun x ultracite@latest format && prettier --write "**/*.{json,yaml,yml}" && markdownlint-cli2 --fix "**/*.{md,mdx,mdc}"
scripts.format:check:all: bun x ultracite@latest lint && prettier --check "**/*.{json,yaml,yml}" && markdownlint-cli2 "**/*.{md,mdx,mdc}" && (stylelint "**/*.css" || echo 'No CSS files found')
scripts.lint: bun x ultracite@latest lint && markdownlint-cli2 "**/*.{md,mdx,mdc}" && (stylelint "**/*.css" || echo 'No CSS files found')
scripts.lint:fix: bun x ultracite@latest format && prettier --write "**/*.{json,yaml,yml}" && markdownlint-cli2 --fix "**/*.{md,mdx,mdc}" && (stylelint --fix "**/*.css" || echo 'No CSS files found')
scripts.ci:full: bun run lint && bun run typecheck && bun run test:ci && bun run build
scripts.release:check: bun run ci:full && bun run lint:packages
scripts.clean: turbo clean && find packages -name 'dist' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
